title: LF someone do duo with to get out of bronze
body:
currently bronze 3 just sick of getting matched with retards i play top lane so must play something els 


add my IGN: Hutsten{{champion:58}}

replies.body: i just look at Hutsten and FuryFighter86 both of ur accounts and both of u would climb if u learn to build items depending on the games simple as that and FuryFighter86 stop getting a damn tear on lux its so stupid  hutsten stop going so many damage items on renekton u dont need to
I might add you up later, i'm S5 Solo Queue and B2 Flex, FuryFighter86.{{champion:102}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:21}}{{champion:37}} {{champion:157}}  < (main champions)
